title: Warui Ko No Tame No Wasuremono Techou
alternative_title: Fundbüro der Liebe ; Love and Removed Thing Left Behind ; The Bad Boy's Notebook of Forgotten Things ; 悪い子のためのわすれもの手帖
status: Fundbüro der Liebe ; Love and Removed Thing Left Behind ; The Bad Boy's Notebook of Forgotten Things ; 悪い子のためのわすれもの手帖
description:
Description :
        Story 1 - Sano tends to forget some things - a wallet, a pen. Little things. There are also things he doesn't forget - like making sure Ashihara is around to remind him when he "forgets" something. It's not deliberate. Really.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1 : The Bad Boy's Notebook Of Things Forgotten
